SEARCH
Package Entities

Class Entity

java.lang.Object
Entities.Entity
Direct Known Subclasses:
Frog, Fruit, Rock, Snake
public abstract class Entity extends Object
The Entity class represents a game entity with a position and drawing capabilities.

      public Point getPosition()
      Gets the current position of the Entity.
      Returns:

    • setPosition

      public void setPosition(Point position)
      Sets the position of the Entity.
      Parameters:
      position - The new position of the Entity.

    • getColor

      public Color getColor()
      Gets the color of the Entity. Default is magenta.
      Returns:
      The color of the Entity.

    • getSprite

      public Image getSprite()
      Gets the sprite image of the Entity. Default is null.
      Returns:
      The sprite image of the Entity.

    • isColliding

      public boolean isColliding(Point point)
      Checks if the Entity is colliding with a specified point.
      Parameters:
      point - The point to check for collision.
      Returns:
      True if the Entity's position equals the specified point, otherwise false.

    • Draw

      public void Draw(Graphics g)
      Draws the Entity using the provided Graphics context.
      Parameters:
      g - The Graphics context to draw on.

    • distanceTo

      public double distanceTo(Entity other)
      Calculates the Euclidean distance to another Entity.
      Parameters:
      other - The other Entity to calculate the distance to.
      Returns:
      The distance to the other Entity.
